# Main

## Katherine Goode {#title}

### Statistician

My research focuses on the explainability and interpretability of machine learning models. Other research interests include model assessment, data visualization, and random forest models. My full CV is available [here](https://goodekat.github.io/cv/goode_cv.pdf).
